WeaponTraitDef.label: PLA extended barrel
WeaponTraitDef.description: A carefully crafted extended barrel. It effectively increases the projectile's muzzle velocity, allowing it to travel further and thus significantly increasing the weapon's effective range.

WeaponTraitDef.label: PLA shortened barrel
WeaponTraitDef.description: A deliberately shortened barrel. This sacrifices projectile velocity, leading to a significant reduction in effective range, but the lighter weight and improved balance allow the operator to aim down sights much faster.
